Builder

Builder

Allows the user to stack the filter functions before they call any of

select() - "get"

insert() - "post"

update() - "patch"

delete() - "delete"

Once any of these are called the filters are passed down to the Request

Constructor

new Builder(url)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
url string

The full URL
